trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> 에 페이저 컨트롤을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> 인터페이스는 중임을 나타내는 표식은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> 컨트롤은의 일부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> 개체의 컨트롤 계층 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 개발자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> 생성자 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> 의 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 사용자 지정 호출기 행을 만드는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow" /> class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> 생성자는 기본 클래스 생성자를 호출한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, 지정 된 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType.Pager>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 와 호출 제어, `rowIndex` -1, `rowType` 같음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType.Pager>, 및 `rowState` 같음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState.Normal>합니다.
